description: When a program attempts to extend a list beyond the maximum size of the list, an OverflowError is raised. This error occurs when the program attempts to extend the list beyond the maximum size of the list, such as when the program attempts to add more elements to the list than the list
code:
my_list = [1,2,3]
my_list.append(4)
my_list.append(5)
my_list.append(6)
my_list.append(7)
my_list.append(8)
my
